title: 装稀有生物1.4.6/1.4.7给自动更新里的1.4.7，然后如下报错
author: aimhabo
txt_content:
本帖最后由 aimhabo 于 2013-2-8 00:29 编辑 

以下摘自报错文件，求解


        Minecraft Version: 1.4.7
          Operating System: Windows XP (x86) version 5.1
          Java Version: 1.6.0_35, Sun Microsystems Inc.
          Java VM Version: Java HotSpot(TM) Client VM (mixed mode), Sun Microsystems Inc.
          Memory: 33695144 bytes (32 MB) / 68694016 bytes (65 MB) up to 1070399488 bytes (1020 MB) 
         JVM Flags: 4 total; -Xincgc -Xmx1024m -XX:PermSize=64m -XX:MaxPermSize=128m
          AABB Pool Size: 0 (0 bytes; 0 MB) allocated, 0 (0 bytes; 0 MB) used 
         Suspicious classes: FML and Forge are installed 
         IntCache: cache: 0, tcache: 0, allocated: 0, tallocated: 0  
        FML: MCP v7.26 FML v4.7.4.520 Minecraft Forge 6.6.0.497 6 mods loaded, 6 mods active
          mcp [Minecraft Coder Pack] (minecraft.jar) Unloaded->Constructed  
        FML [Forge Mod Loader] (coremods) Unloaded->Constructed 
         Forge [Minecraft Forge] (coremods) Unloaded->Constructed
          mod_ReiMinimap [mod_ReiMinimap] (minecraft.jar) Unloaded->Constructed
          InfernalMobs [Infernal Mobs] (atomicstryker) Unloaded->Errored 
         More Pistons [More Pistons] (morePistons) Unloaded->Errored  
        LWJGL: 2.4.2
          OpenGL: ATI Mobility Radeon HD 3400 Series GL version 3.3.10188 Compatibility Profile Context, ATI Technologies Inc.  
        Is Modded: Definitely; Client brand changed to 'forge,fml'  
        Type: Client (map_client.txt)          Texture Pack: Default  
        Profiler Position: N/A (disabled)  
        Vec3 Pool Size: ~~ERROR~~ NullPointerException: null

replies.txt_content: 没有这个mod，你说的是更多生物mod吧

replies.author: wuyuanyi
replies.txt_content: 你确定这是错误报告的全部内容？

replies.author: aimhabo
replies.txt_content:
天空の遗迹 发表于 2013-2-8 05:10 
forge为什么在coremods文件夹里面？
据说【从哪据说的？忘了】是要拖进.minecraft.jar，然后我用rar直接把forge解压的东西拖进去了
